channel.title: Aggroth v4 Issues
channel.description:

It just spams it again and again. I think is has to do with the mysql. but i went to server.java and madturnipconnection.java and commented everything dealing with highscores,voting, and donating. If someone could just tell me what to do or fix it for me <3 . I would be grateful either way. Thank you for looking or if you decide to help or try to help thank you for that :)
Also it cant find the cache or something when i run the client , but i know how to fix that .

item.title: Aggroth v4 Issues
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Make sure you recompiled after commenting everything out.

Read full topic

item.title: Aggroth v4 Issues
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

Relax, it’s just saying it cant connect to mysql. You should be able to log on just fine… unless the server depended on mysql.

Read full topic
